title: How was your PESSAT 2022?
content: About to write it in 3 days and kinda nervous. How was your exam though, in terms of difficulty when compared to KCET, and COMEDK and also how much are you expecting in marks?

comments.body: You sure? Cause people say it's Bitsat level
I myself gave both exams and bitsat also.

This motivates me my friend... Cause I find bitsat questions difficult to solve in a minute... If it's comedk/ cet level I might still have a chance... Did you give it this year? And how did your paper go?
Yeah this year, chem was good but not sure but maths went bad.
Any idea about marks verses rank? CSE ends at rank around 1200-1400 so idk how much marks are required

Bruh thats why i am confused, result will come on 14 and 
I have manipal jaipur cse seat which i may lose because of it.

So what's your plan then?... I messed up my comedk because I just shifted to Bangalore and in the process couldn't study... I think if you are confident that you'll atleast get 120-130 only then it's worth risking the manipal seat
